subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Bangladesh's stature as a test-playing nation took a hit in England, as it decidedly lost two matches, but a gem of a player was uncovered in the young batsman Tamim Iqbal.
snippet: Bangladesh's stature as a test-playing nation took a hit in England, as it decidedly lost two matches, but a gem of a player was uncovered in the young batsman Tamim Iqbal.
